thread.section_title: The Nadler Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb hotel
thread.title_full: Superb hotel - Review of The Nadler Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Richard B
title: Superb hotel
text: Wonderful hotel situated very close to Earl's Court station. The staff were very welcoming and the room was superb. The addition of a discreet kitchenette was great, and the reception staff could provide a varied list of local restaurants which offered a discount for those staying at the hotel which was a lovely surprise. A great way for my wife and I to celebrate our anniversary in style.
